lead_paragraph: Symbols painted on the sidewalks of the earthquake-prone city mark the places to gather when the tremors start.

headline.print_headline: Green Squares (or Circles) That Might Save Your Life
headline.main: That Green Square (or Circle) in Mexico City Might Save Your Life

snippet: Symbols painted on the sidewalks of the earthquake-prone city mark the places to gather when the tremors start....
abstract: What in the World column; Mexico City has so-called meeting points painted onto its sidewalks in order to act as organizational aid during emergencies, like earthquakes, to which city is particularly vulnerable.
